# features(at:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the feature provider at the given index.

## Declaration

```swift
func features(at index: Int) -> any MLFeatureProvider
```

## Parameters

- **index**: The index of the desired feature provider.

## Return Value

The feature provider at the given index.

## Accessing values

- **count**: The number of feature providers in this batch.

items.description: The number of feature providers in this batch.
